description:
This is an edit part that allows you to change the shape of your Outer's face to Ciri's face.

※You will need the production version of DAEMON X MACHINA to use this content.
※This content is not equipment, and is purely cosmetic. There are no status changes when using this content.
※This content is only available for female Outers. This cannot be used with male Outers
name: Edit part for Outer "Ciri's Shape"
